author: Vikas
title: Biryani
description: This biryani is also known as kachay gosht ki biryani or dum biryani, where the meat is marinated and cooked along with short grain and fine rice. It is left on a slow fire or dum for a fragrant and aromatic flavour.

procedure.method: Slice onions very finely and fry until crisp and light golden brown.
Combine chicken with all marinade ingredients, ⅓ fried onions and ground biryani spice blend.
Rinse basmati rice until clear. Soak ⅓ cup rice in water. Cook remaining rice in rice cooker. For alternative traditional cooking method check our lamb biryani recipe.
